description: A group of 'extremely frustrated' teachers want the two-school model put on hold.
title: Guernsey's teachers warn of 'calamitous' education plans
title_page: Guernsey's teachers warn of 'calamitous' education plans - BBC News
maintext: It reads: "Whilst we agree with the Executive Leadership Team that delay and uncertainty are difficult, we strongly feel that to continue along the present path without pause for reflection and improvements to the current transition model will lead to a calamitous result for education and the island as a whole."
